title: Fix VoiceCommands so they work whether the app is in the foreground or not
body: Right now, Voice Commands registered for an app only work when an app is off, or in the background. They do not work if you are in the application already, and use Speech from the Windows key to navigate somewhere else in the app.

comments.body: This really needs to fix because this behavior does not make any sense!
Ridiculous that this is still an issue. Any sign of it being addressed?
FYI, the "fix" is to turn Fast App Resume off.
